name: New Wave Hobbies Demo
description: I am currently teaching myself GB Studio. I've been creating my sprite sheets in Photoshop and building my maps in Tiled, then piecing it all together in GB Studio. This game demo is a mockup of an awesome hobby store near where I live. I currently don't have any objectives to the game yet, as I'm still learning the software and need to get variables down before going much further. As of uploading this, I just started GB Studio 2 days ago.
